author: Cynthia
text: I received FAKE Nike Dunks! I order a men’s 7.5 which is my usual size and the size I ALWAYS purchase in men’s Nike and I received a size 7.5 that’s fits like a boys size 6!  This size discrepancy is always synonymous with KNOCKOFFS! I’m still waiting on a resolution from Stock X after sending a bunch of photos at their request. I will never order from here again. I don’t understand how you guys authenticated this sneaker and I still received a fake sneaker. To date 4/12/22 .. it’s been 4 days and no response after I sent ALL of the requested photos. Still waiting on a resolution.
title: I received FAKE Nike Dunks!

author: Elizabeth
text: Shoes were 2 different colors after being “verified”. Reached out to stockx with no response. This was my first purchase through this site and only looked at 1 shoe upon arrival and didn’t get them back out to wear until my event. Disappointed because my only assumption can be that they in fact are not real after paying so much.
title: “Verified” fake

author: Víctor
text: Good (original shoes and good operation of the app) but my shoes had 2 small stains in clearly visible areas (the management payment is supposed to be for someone to check it thoroughly) and the other complaint is that the chosen shipping company (UPS) decided to leave the package at a collection point marking that "The addressee was not at the home" when I had been waiting and no one called home or my phone (they always do) so having paid for an expensive shipment in the end I had that I go to pick it up.
title: Good although some complaints
